name: Eleven
line: Mama? It's me. Jane. I'm home.

name: Terry
line: No. Sunflower. Four to the left. Sunflower. Four-fifty. Sunflower. Rainbow.

name: Eleven
line: Okay. You okay? She kept showing the girl in the room. I think this is why Mama wanted to talk. I think she wants me to find her.

name: Becky
line: I just... I didn't know who else to call. He gave me this number, and he came here looking for her. I thought maybe he could help me. Yeah, Jim Hopper, he came here with some woman named Joyce Byers? There's another girl, and she's missing, and I think she's in trouble. I just... I didn't know who to call.

name: Florence
line: Thank you, thank you. And you are?

name: Becky
line: Florence... I'm gonna have to call you back.

name: Eleven
line: Becky! Becky, I found her. Jane?

name: Dottie
line: You should do stand-up, Axe. There's a spot a few blocks away. There aren't any cows to milk here, kid. Go on back to the farm now. Aw... Shirley Temple lost her sister. So sad.

name: Mick
line: What is she wearing? What are those, overalls? Axe!

name: Eleven
line: I'm looking for my sister. I saw her. Here. In the rainbow room. Jane.

name: Axel
line: Give me that shit. How did you find us? Who else knows you're here? That's not an answer. You're a terrible dancer, Axel.

name: Kali
line: Is that Kali? Stay calm. She's just a kid. So, we're threatening little girls now, are we? Where did you get this? So, you just show up like magic with that picture? And this memory your mother shared... that is your only memory of me? And how long have you been with this policeman?

name: Eleven
line: No one. Mama. In her dream circle. Yes. Three hundred and twenty-seven days.

name: Kali
line: And this policeman, he thinks he can work out some sort of deal with these men to set you free? He's na√Øve then. We'll always be monsters to them. Do you understand? Let me guess. Your policeman, he also stops you from using your gifts? What you can do is incredible. It makes you very special, Jane.

name: Eleven
line: Wait.

name: Kali
line: Do you have a gift? Different. I can make people see, or not see, whatever I choose. Is that why you made the man with the crazy hair dance?

name: Eleven
line: You made him see spiders?

name: Kali
line: But it doesn't have to be scary. This butterfly, it isn't real. I've just convinced your mind it is. Think of it as a kind of magic.

name: Eleven
line: Are you real?

name: Kali
line: Yes, I'm real.

name: Eleven
line: What's wrong?

name: Kali
line: Nothing is wrong. I just feel... whole... now. Like... a piece of me was missing, and now it's not. Does that make sense? I think your mother sent you here for a reason. I think she somehow knew that we belong together. I think this is your home.

name: Eleven
line: Home.

name: Kali
line: Yes. Home.

name: Axel
line: Shit. How's your white hick sister? You tuck her in real tight? Yeah, what about a lullaby? Did you sing her one? Old MacDonald had a farm. E-I-E-I-O. And on his farm he had a cow.

name: Kali
line: She found me with only this.

name: Axel
line: What's that mean?

name: Kali
line: It means she can find people without moving. With nothing but an image.

name: Axel
line: You telling me Shirley's a human radar detector or some shit? Come on. No way.

name: Kali
line: Or some shit, yes. We'll find out soon enough. I want to do one. Tomorrow.

name: Mick
line: We're way too hot right now.

name: Axel
line: Paranoid.

name: Mick
line: Realistic. You don't kill their men and expect them to look the other way.

name: Axel
line: If they find us, they will unleash hell.

name: Kali
line: So we give in to fear? She's in pain. She needs this. We go out tomorrow.

name: Axel
line: Swear to God, Shirley Temple's gonna get us all killed.

name: Hopper
line: It's me. I know that I've been gone too long, and, uh... I just want you to know that it's not because of you. And it's not because of our fight. Something came up, and, uh, I'll explain everything soon. I just, um... I want you to know that I'm not... I'm not mad at you. I... I'm just sorry.

name: Kali
line: It's okay. It's only me.

name: Eleven
line: Bad dream?

name: Kali
line: What time is it? It's late. You slept well. Come. It's time you meet my friends. Properly this time.

name: Axel
line: We need more money, Kal. I can't keep eating this garbage.

name: Kali
line: This is Axel. The spider hater? Yes, the spider hater. This is Dottie, our newest. Like you, she just left home.

name: Axel
line: You mean the loony bin.

name: Kali
line: Mick, our eyes, our protector. This is Funshine, our warrior. Don't let his size frighten you. Fun's a teddy bear.

name: Funshine
line: Nice to meet you, Miss Jane.

name: Kali
line: If you're looking for a number, you won't find one. They're not like us. No, not in that way. But like us, they're outcasts.

name: Eleven
line: Outcasts?

name: Axel
line: Freaks.

name: Dottie
line: Speak for yourself.

name: Kali
line: Society left them behind, hurt them, discarded them.

name: Funshine
line: We were dead, all of us.

name: Kali
line: Kali saved us. Here. And here.

name: Funshine
line: Don't get all mushy on us now, Fun.

name: Kali
line: No, not mushy. True. Now we help her.

name: Funshine
line: In this life, kid, you roll over or you fight back. We're all fighters here.

name: Eleven
line: Fight who?

name: Kali
line: Everyone you see here was in some way responsible for what happened to us.

name: Eleven
line: You hurt the bad men?

name: Axel
line: No, we just give 'em a pat on the back.

name: Eleven
line: You kill them?

name: Kali
line: They're criminals. We simply make them pay for their crimes.

name: Axel
line: Boom. Damn, Shirley. What's the matter? You look like you've seen a ghost.

name: Dottie
line: We can't all be fighters, I guess.

name: Eleven
line: I'm a fighter. I've killed.

name: Kali
line: These men you killed, did they deserve it?

name: Eleven
line: They hurt me.

name: Kali
line: And they still want to hurt you. To hurt us. We're just making the first move. Come. I was just like you once. I kept my anger inside. I tried to hide from it, but then that pain festered.

name: Eleven
line: Festered?

name: Kali
line: It spread. Until finally I confronted my pain, and I began to heal.

name: Eleven
line: Do you see that train? Yes.

name: Kali
line: I want you to draw it to us.

name: Eleven
line: I can't.

name: Kali
line: Last night you told me you lifted a van once.

name: Eleven
line: Yes.

name: Kali
line: The bad men were trying to take you again, and that made you angry. Good. So, find that anger, focus on that, not the train, not its weight. I want you to find something from your life. Something that angers you.

name: Max
line: Do I have a mother? She's not around anymore.

name: Hopper
line: Don't walk away from me! Grow the hell up!

name: Kali
line: The bad men took away your home, your mother... They took everything from you. They stole your life, Jane. I want you to find them.

name: Mick
line: Yeah! Yeah, Jane!

name: Kali
line: So, how do you feel?

name: Eleven
line: Good.

name: Kali
line: These are the bad men, as you call them. The one's we believe are still alive. Do you know any?

name: Eleven
line: Him. He hurt Mama.

name: Dr. Brenner
line: Four-fifty...

name: Kali
line: His name is Ray Caroll. And he did more than hurt your mother. The bad men like Ray, they know about us. It's made them hard to track. But maybe not anymore.

name: Axel
line: Gramercy Apartments. Washington and Bethel. That's gotta be it. Right?

name: Mick
line: Lilburn. Where is that? About an hour east.

name: Axel
line: We don't even have a new ride.

name: Dottie
line: So we swap plates. We have plates, right?

name: Mick
line: Yeah. It's risky.

name: Axel
line: Where's the fun if there's no risk?

name: Kali
line: We want to give my sister a memorable first day, right?

name: Funshine
line: I'm in. For Miss Jane.

name: Axel
line: Yeah, sure. Why not? Mick?

name: Mick
line: Screw it!

name: Eleven
line: Bitchin'.

name: Kali
line: Bitchin'.

name: Dottie
line: What are we doing?

name: Axel
line: Stocking up.

name: Dottie
line: Hey, your bathroom is leaking.

name: Axel
line: Oh, shit.

name: Eleven
line: Yes.

name: Dottie
line: Shit.

name: Axel
line: Okay, contestants, you have a minute and a half, let's begin your supermarket sweep!

name: Dottie
line: Hey! Put that back, or I'll blow your head off. You hear me, freak?

name: Kali
line: Put the gun down.

name: Dottie
line: Stay back. Stay back.

name: Kali
line: Darrel, your money is insured. We're only stealing from the war criminal billionaires who own this place. You won't even lose a dime.

name: Dottie
line: I said stay back.

name: Kali
line: We're on the same side. I promise.

name: Axel
line: Damn, Shirley.

name: Mick
line: Let's go! Go! Go, go, go, go! Mick! We gotta go, Mick!

name: Kali
line: We should case the place, stick to the routine. We have time.

name: Mick
line: We also have her. Can you look?

name: Eleven
line: He's watching television. I saw him. No one else.

name: Axel
line: Good enough for me.

name: Mick
line: Me, too.

name: Kali
line: Let's do this.

name: Mick
line: Keep it running.

name: Axel
line: Meet you around back.

name: Punky
line: What's the matter? A nightmare. I dreamt I was in the doctor's office. All of a sudden, he's started to give me my shot in my arm. Then the needle got bigger and bigger and bigger...

name: Kali
line: Hello, Ray.

name: Ray
line: Jesus Christ!

name: Funshine
line: Sit down. Please. I said sit.

name: Ray
line: Please... Just, please... just take what you want.

name: Axel
line: Oh, we will. Where's your wallet?

name: Ray
line: Bedroom. My bedroom. My jeans.

name: Axel
line: Come on.

name: Dottie
line: Yes.

name: Axel
line: Got it.

name: Kali
line: Do you remember us? What about us? Do you remember us, Ray?

name: Ray
line: Please. Please.

name: Eleven
line: You hurt Mama.

name: Ray
line: Wait. Please. Listen... I just did what he told me to do. He said she was sick.

name: Kali
line: You had a choice, Ray. And you chose to follow a man you knew was evil.

name: Ray
line: No, wait! No, wait! Wait! I can help. I can help you find him.

name: Kali
line: Find who?

name: Ray
line: Brenner! I can take you to him.

name: Eleven
line: Papa is gone.

name: Ray
line: No, he is alive.

name: Kali
line: Do not lie to us, Ray.

name: Ray
line: I'm not lying! I swear... He trusts me. I'll take you to him.

name: Kali
line: If he's alive, Jane will find him. Just as she found you. Do it, Jane.

name: Ray
line: Wait.

name: Kali
line: Not too quick. He wasn't so generous with your mother.

name: Woman
line: Sweetie, just stay calm. The police are on their way, honey. Okay?

name: Axel
line: Oh, shit!

name: Kali
line: What's wrong?

name: Mick
line: What's wrong? We got a problem.

name: Dottie
line: Kids in the apartment.

name: Ray
line: Please...

name: Kali
line: Did he show your mother mercy? No. He took her from you, without hesitation.

name: Ray
line: I'm sorry. Please don't. Please.

name: Axel
line: We got to go, K. They called the cops.

name: Kali
line: We finish this first.

name: Axel
line: Kali!

name: Kali
line: Jane, now!

name: Ray
line: Please, don't... Please. Please.

name: Kali
line: If you wanted to show mercy, that is your choice. But don't you ever take away mine. Ever. Do you understand? Do you understand?

name: Funshine
line: I see you, and I raise you ten. How ya like that?

name: Dottie
line: That was a mistake right there, girl. A mistake. I think you're full of shit.

name: Kali
line: May I sit? I was once just like you, you know that? But that's why I'm hard on you, because I see in you my past mistakes.

name: Eleven
line: They were kids.

name: Kali
line: Does that excuse that man's sins? Were we not also children? I remember the day I came to the rainbow room and you were gone. So, when my gifts were strong enough, I used them to escape. And I ran. I ran away as far as I could. And it was there, far away, that I found a place to hide. A family. A home. Just like you and your policeman. But they couldn't help me. So, eventually, I lost them, too. So, I decided to play the part. To stop hiding. To use my gifts against those who hurt us. You're now faced with the same choice, Jane. Go back into hiding and hope they don't find you. Fight, and face them again.

name: Eleven
line: Face who?

name: Kali
line: The man who calls himself our father.

name: Eleven
line: Papa is dead.

name: Dr. Brenner
line: That man tonight disagreed.

name: Eleven
line: You're not real.

name: Dr. Brenner
line: All this time? And you haven't looked for me? Why? Because you thought I was dead? Or because you were afraid of what you might find?

name: Eleven
line: Go away.

name: Dr. Brenner
line: You have to confront your pain. You have a wound, Eleven, a terrible wound. And it's festering. Do you remember what that means? Festering? It means a rot. And it will grow. Spread. And eventually, it will kill you.

name: Eleven
line: Get out of my head! Get out of my head!

name: Kali
line: This isn't a prison, Jane. You're always free to return to your policeman. Or stay, and avenge your mother. Let us heal our wounds together.

name: Funshine
line: Full house.

name: Axel
line: Screw this. I'm out.

name: Funshine
line: Out of money, you mean. You are broke!

name: Mick
line: You want in, Mick? Nope.

name: Dottie
line: Aw, come on! Just one hand.

name: Mick
line: You're the worst.

name: Dottie
line: How am I the worst?

name: Mick
line: Because, one hand leads to two hands, two hands leads to three. Before you know it, I'm as broke as Axel.

name: Dottie
line: Are you in or out?

name: Mick
line: Out.

name: Mike
line: Maybe we can call you 'El.' Short for Eleven. You'd better run! She's our friend, and she's crazy! No, El, you're not the monster. You saved me, you understand? You saved me.

name: Eleven
line: Compromise?

name: Hopper
line: It's something that's kind of in between. Like halfway happy. Once we fix it up, it's gonna be nice. Real nice. This is your new home.

name: Eleven
line: That's where I was. It's a damn graveyard. I need to get through! I need to get through! I need to warn them. It's a trap! I need to get through. It's a trap. I need to tell them it's a trap. Mike! Mike! Mike, where are you? Mike! Mike!

name: Hopper
line: Whoa! Whoa!

name: Axel
line: The hell's going on?

name: Mick
line: They found us!

name: Axel
line: Jesus! Jesus Christ!

name: Funshine
line: Let's go! Now!

name: Kali
line: Hey! Hey! Jane, come on! Come on, hurry!

name: Axel
line: Do something, Kal. Do something!

name: Kali
line: Jane, get in.

name: Eleven
line: It's a damn graveyard. Mike! It's a trap! It's a trap! I'm sorry. I'm sorry, but I have to go back. My friends... My friends are in danger.

name: Axel
line: This isn't time for a talk. We got to go right now!

name: Kali
line: Your mother sent you here for a reason, remember? We belong together. There's nothing for you back there. They cannot save you, Jane.

name: Eleven
line: No. But I can save them.

name: Axel
line: The hell was that? What's wrong with her?

name: Woman
line: You all right, sweetie? You were looking a little forlorn there. You mind if I join you? You are awfully young to be traveling alone, aren't you? Well, you are quite the chatterbox. So, where are you headed? To your parents, I hope?

name: Eleven
line: I'm going to my friends. I'm going home.
